metadata.symbol: An exclusive offering of NFT's from internationally collected digital artist Mark Lawrence.
metadata.description:
For the first time ever, a selection of the original digital paintings from the Mark Lawrence collection are listed for sale as collectible NFTs.

John 18:36. My Kingdom Is Not Of This World. 60 x 40 inches digital art NFT marklawrencegallery.com

Jesus answered, “My kingdom is not of this world. If My kingdom were of this world, My servants would fight, so that I should not be delivered to the Jews; but now My kingdom is not from here.” John 18:36.

We are excited to make available NFTs from top selling and internationally collected artist Mark Lawrence (1961). Since 2012, thousands of Lawrence open-edition bible verse inspired modern art prints have many been sold. His colorful abstract art is displayed in homes, commercial buildings, offices, restaurants, and hotels throughout the world.  

The winner of the auction will immediately upon payment receive ownership of the NFT certificate for this digital painting. In addition, the Mark Lawrence Gallery will custom produce a certified Embellished/Signed/Numbered (ESN) edition canvas giclee and ship to the buyer’s registered address within 6 weeks of payment. 

The giclee canvas edition is shipped rolled with delivery available worldwide.

NFT details:

  • 1 out of 1 – only 1 NFT of this artwork will ever be made
  • This NFT comes with a certificate of ownership as the private file
  • Created and certified by the artist Mark Lawrence
  • Copyright ownership is not transferred
